Reviews.Title: A very good camera!
Reviews.Author: Myst
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! The picture quality is amazing for a point and shoot, and the flash works really nice. There are a ton of modes and it even has it's own make up feature when it takes a portrait picture. It's very sleek and slim for a camera as well, so it can fit anywhere you want to put it!The video recording is pretty good, but it only records sound for about a minute and thirty seconds, which can be annoying. The lens also get's stuck from time to time, but that is just because I put my camera in my pocket instead of a case.So if you want a nice point and shoot camera for a reasonable price, get this one!

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: mreenrose
Reviews.Content: I love this camera because it's totally easy to use, takes great photos in any light, and everything is automatic.  This is a great first camera or a camera for someone like me who doesn't like to fool around with a lot of different settings and features that I will never use.  It's small and goes anywhere--I love it!

Reviews.Title: Another great casio point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd casio Exlim camera. All of them are great and I have passed them along to my family members as I upgraded to the new models. I did not experience the microphone failure while shooting videos as it worked the entire length of the video (over 6 minutes). The image quality of the video image is reduced as you zoom in. Nice light weight camera. I plan to take backpacking with me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price...
Reviews.Author: Kiran Yerneni
Reviews.Content: The camera is real slim and easy to carry. Upload of photos was easy and the s/w was auto installed once i plugged in the USB. There was no need for CD to upload your photos. One other thing i liked was the megapixel that you can choose from...it has 14MP but you can choose from 6, 3 etc depending on the photo print size that you want to take.Over all good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: anyuta
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, it's not working for me. Camera takes decent pictures sometimes, but a lot of times, they're out of focus and it takes forever to take the next picture. I have a 6 month old, so it's crucial to be able to take pictures quick and this camera is not doing the job well :(
